Uses of Class
io.permazen.Permazen

  • Packages that use Permazen 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.cli
    Permazen Command Line Interface (CLI) classes.
    io.permazen.cli.telnet
    Support for Permazen Command Line Interface (CLI) over telnet connections.
    io.permazen.maven
    Permazen Maven plugins.
    io.permazen.parse
    Permazen parsing related classes.
    io.permazen.spring
    Spring Framework integration classes.
    io.permazen.vaadin
    Classes to facilitate Vaadin applications that interact with a Permazen database.
    io.permazen.vaadin.app
    Support for Permazen GUI applications based on Vaadin.

    • Uses of Permazen in io.permazen

      Methods in io.permazen that return Permazen 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Permazen JSchemaObject.getPermazen()
      Get the Permazen with which this instance is associated.
      Permazen Session.getPermazen()
      Get the associated Permazen, if any.
      Permazen JTransaction.getPermazen()
      Get the Permazen associated with this instance.
      Permazen PermazenFactory.newPermazen()
      Construct a Permazen instance using this instance's configuration.
